pages.text: $(li)The Blaze Powder is an item used as fuel in the Brewing Stand.$(br)$(li)It can be used to brew a Potion of Strength in a Brewing Stand.
$(li)Finally, the Blaze Powder can be used to craft a Fire Charge, Blaze Lantern, Magma Cream, Copper Lanterns, or even a Eye of Ender in a Crafting Table.
